トピック.授業計画1:
HyFlex（Hybrid Flexible）session. The course will discuss the principles, theories and practices of marketing with a particular emphasis on brand marketing and corporate communication.
Research meetings will be held on an individual basis.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are responsible to obtain relevant literature to their research and should contact instructor if there is a need to access certain research material. Students are expected to study the assigned materials carefully and use additional materials beyond the assigned readings to expand their understanding and contribute in discussions.
